extendedInfo.description: Line Runner 2 now available, we suggest checking out Line Runner 2 if you like Line Runner!The Original #1 best selling iPhone game now available for your android device!- Join more than 6 million Line Runner players around the world and try to beat their score with this recent #1 app store hit! - From the makers of Stick Stunt Biker, Rope'n'Fly, Line Birds, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and more -  More than 6 million addicted players can't be wrong! Quickly jump over and roll through obstacles, as fast and as far as you can. Try to beat other players highscore on up to 10 different tracks. FEATURES: - Very fast paced gameplay - Really challenging - Increasing difficulty from easy to bone breaking - Openfeint leaderboard - Challenge your friends and all other players worldwide - Different difficultiesPLUS VERSION:- Get the plus version (also available in the market) which has no ads!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Running slow
reviews.comment: Can any one tell me whynis this game playng slow on my device?? Runner is running like jogging...

reviews.title: I like this game
reviews.comment: I like the game. But when I get a job one day and afford to have a credit card, I will get the full version. The adverts disturb my progress.

reviews.title: Had to download twice... on my s4
reviews.comment: The first time I downloaded it there was a black screen and it wouldn\'t load. Uninstalled and tried again haven\'t found out yet if it is going to do it again.

reviews.title: Ads ruin gameplay

reviews.title: Awesome but...
reviews.comment: Entertaining game but you seriously need to fix your score because i cant read it. And it also needs a high score board. Please fix and improve.

reviews.title: From: RgTV.
reviews.comment: I like and hate this game about 10%. I like it because it is challenging-ly fun. I hate it because it want\'s me to rate it early and my remove ad button is broken. Anyways, it is fun! And please help me removing the stupis ads.

reviews.title: good & bad
reviews.comment: Good and bad. Good because it\'s really fun and challenging. Bad because there\'s way to many ads. And when I didn\'t even have a chance to play for the first time, it ask me to rate it. So I thought you guys should just know.

reviews.comment: This game is simple,  but dont let it fool you. It presents a challange. I could play this for hours. :)
